attributes.action: Let the Oundle School 4th team rugby team have their own special kit.
attributes.background: I believe that the Oundle School 4th team rugby team should have their own kit to celebrate their lovely unbeaten run this season

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about school sports kits are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.
